txt.en: Calm frightened marsh-tenders in the Gladden Fields
You have calmed many of the frightened marsh-tenders in the Gladden Fields.

Frightened marsh-tenders can be found at Gilvamyr and Gladden Falls in the Gladden Fields.\n\nYou have discovered some of the frightened marsh-tenders that Radagast encountered in his travels. You should try to calm their fears and aid them in tending the Gladden Fields.
Calm frightened marsh-tenders in the Gladden Fields ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Although you do not know what caused their sudden fear, you have succeeded in calming a number of marsh-tenders in the Gladden Fields.
Calmed frightened marsh-tenders in the Gladden Fields ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Calmed frightened marsh-tenders in the Gladden Fields ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

While exploring the Gladden Fields, you have noticed a number of frightened marsh-tenders hiding amidst the reeds. Although Radagast remains uncertain as to the cause of their sudden timidity, he believes you may be able to coax them into again serving as the dutiful tenders of the Gladden Fields.
While some of the marsh-lurkers who tend the Gladden Fields have turned to madness, others have succumbed to fear.
Calm frightened marsh-tenders in the Gladden Fields ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
